actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, as amended, to provide for emergency allotment lease and transfer of certain tobacco allotments or quotas in disaster areas.

summary.text: Provides for emergency allotment lease and transfer of tobacco allotments or quotas in disaster areas.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1938, as amended, to provide for emergency allotment lease and transfer of certain tobacco allotments or quotas in disaster areas.
